channel.title: Dinosaurs on Martin Chorley
channel.description: Recent content in Dinosaurs on Martin Chorley

item.title: Post-Processed Dinosaurs
item.description: Finding myself with a free afternoon this week, I strolled down to the local Odeon to see Jurassic Park: IMAX 3D. (It should be noted that the ‘IMAX” bit doesn’t mean much - the screen at the Odeon is nowhere near as big as a true ‘IMAX’ screen). I should say, I love this film a lot - hence my willingness to pay £12 (£12!!??!) to see it again on the big screen.
